title: Battery Drains rapidly (1% a second or faster) when phone reaches 15% charge.
content:
I have a Google Pixel 3 and recently the phone has started dying seconds after it reaches 15% battery charge even on Battery Saver mode. My usage has not changed. I haven't downloaded some heavy load apps or games. The battery level just plummets when it reaches 15%. 

What's going on? This has to be a joke.
